item.gardentools.cultivator.tooltip: Hoe farmland with range and elevation support
item.gardentools.planter.tooltip: Finds seeds in your inventory and plants a batch
block.gardentools.feeder.tooltip: Feeder uses items laying on the ground
block.gardentools.rancher.tooltip: Shears sheep; uses buckets laying on the ground
block.gardentools.magnet.tooltip: Placing on a container means pulled items will be filtered
